nested-menu/default copy.highlightedCode:
import React, { useState, useContext, createContext, FC } from 'react';
import { Collapsible, CollapsibleContent, CollapsibleTrigger } from '@/components/ui/collapsible';
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils';

/**
 * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 * Types and Helper Function
 * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 */

export type MenuItemData = {
  id: string;
  label: string;
  href?: string;
  children?: MenuItemData[];
};

export type ClassNames = {
  container?: string;
  list?: string;
  item?: string;
  trigger?: string;
  content?: string;
};

export interface NestedMenuProps {
  data: MenuItemData[];
  /**
   * A global router “match” function.
   * For example: (href) => window.location.pathname === href
   */
  matchFn: (href: string) => boolean;
  /**
   * When false, only one sibling with children will be open at a time.
   * Defaults to true.
   */
  allowMultipleExpanded?: boolean;
  /**
   * Optionally override the default CSS class names.
   */
  classNames?: ClassNames;
}

/**
 * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 * Context for Single-Expanded Mode per Level
 * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 */

interface MenuListContextType {
  allowMultipleExpanded: boolean;
  openItemId: string | null;
  setOpenItemId: (id: string | null) => void;
}
const MenuListContext = createContext<MenuListContextType | null>(null);

/**
 * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 * Helper: Compute Active States
 *
 * Given a menu item and the match function, this helper returns:
 * - active: true if this item’s href matches.
 * - here: true if one (or more) of its descendant items is active.
 * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 */
function getMenuItemStatus(
  item: MenuItemData,
  matchFn: (href: string) => boolean
): { active: boolean; here: boolean } {
  let active = false;
  if (item.href) {
    active = matchFn(item.href);
  }
  let here = false;
  if (item.children && item.children.length > 0) {
    for (const child of item.children) {
      const childStatus = getMenuItemStatus(child, matchFn);
      if (childStatus.active || childStatus.here) {
        here = true;
        break;
      }
    }
  }
  return { active, here };
}

/**
 * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 * MenuList Component
 *
 * Renders a list (<ul>) of menu items. When allowMultipleExpanded is false,
 * it creates a context that tracks the one “open” (expanded) item on that level.
 * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 */
interface MenuListProps {
  items: MenuItemData[];
  matchFn: (href: string) => boolean;
  allowMultipleExpanded: boolean;
  classNames: ClassNames;
}

const MenuList: FC<MenuListProps> = ({
  items,
  matchFn,
  allowMultipleExpanded,
  classNames,
}) => {
  if (!allowMultipleExpanded) {
    // Determine if any item should be open by default (because one of its descendants is active)
    const initialOpenItemId =
      items.find(
        (item) =>
          item.children &&
          item.children.length > 0 &&
          getMenuItemStatus(item, matchFn).here
      )?.id || null;
    const [openItemId, setOpenItemId] = useState<string | null>(initialOpenItemId);

    return (
      <MenuListContext.Provider
        value={{ allowMultipleExpanded, openItemId, setOpenItemId }}
      >
        <ul className={cn('nested-menu-list', classNames.list)}>
          {items.map((item) => (
            <MenuItem
              key={item.id}
              item={item}
              matchFn={matchFn}
              allowMultipleExpanded={allowMultipleExpanded}
              classNames={classNames}
            />
          ))}
        </ul>
      </MenuListContext.Provider>
    );
  }

  return (
    <ul className={cn('nested-menu-list', classNames.list)}>
      {items.map((item) => (
        <MenuItem
          key={item.id}
          item={item}
          matchFn={matchFn}
          allowMultipleExpanded={allowMultipleExpanded}
          classNames={classNames}
        />
      ))}
    </ul>
  );
};

/**
 * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 * MenuItem Component
 *
 * Renders a single menu item. If the item has children, it uses Collapsible,
 * CollapsibleTrigger, and CollapsibleContent to make the submenu expandable.
 * It adds the following CSS classes based on state:
 * - "active" when this item is the active route.
 * - "here" when one of its descendants is active.
 * - "show" when its submenu is open.
 * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 */
interface MenuItemProps {
  item: MenuItemData;
  matchFn: (href: string) => boolean;
  allowMultipleExpanded: boolean;
  classNames: ClassNames;
}

const MenuItem: FC<MenuItemProps> = ({
  item,
  matchFn,
  allowMultipleExpanded,
  classNames,
}) => {
  const status = getMenuItemStatus(item, matchFn);
  const isLeaf = !item.children || item.children.length === 0;

  if (isLeaf) {
    return (
      <li
        className={cn(
          'nested-menu-item',
          { active: status.active },
          classNames.item
        )}
      >
        {item.href ? (
          <a href={item.href} className={cn('nested-menu-link', classNames.trigger)}>
            {item.label}
          </a>
        ) : (
          <span className={cn('nested-menu-label', classNames.trigger)}>
            {item.label}
          </span>
        )}
      </li>
    );
  } else {
    // For items with children, use Collapsible for expand/collapse.
    let controlledOpen: boolean;
    let setControlledOpen: (open: boolean) => void;
    const context = useContext(MenuListContext);
    if (context && !allowMultipleExpanded) {
      controlledOpen = context.openItemId === item.id;
      setControlledOpen = (open: boolean) => {
        if (open) {
          context.setOpenItemId(item.id);
        } else {
          context.setOpenItemId(null);
        }
      };
    } else {
      const [open, setOpen] = useState(status.here);
      controlledOpen = open;
      setControlledOpen = setOpen;
    }

    return (
      <li
        className={cn(
          'nested-menu-item',
          { active: status.active, here: status.here, show: controlledOpen },
          classNames.item
        )}
      >
        <Collapsible
          open={controlledOpen}
          onOpenChange={(open) => setControlledOpen(open)}
        >
          <CollapsibleTrigger asChild>
            <div className={cn('nested-menu-trigger', classNames.trigger)}>
              {item.label}
              {/* Optionally add an arrow/icon here */}
            </div>
          </CollapsibleTrigger>
          <CollapsibleContent className={cn('nested-menu-content', classNames.content)}>
            <MenuList
              items={item.children!}
              matchFn={matchFn}
              allowMultipleExpanded={allowMultipleExpanded}
              classNames={classNames}
            />
          </CollapsibleContent>
        </Collapsible>
      </li>
    );
  }
};

/**
 * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 * NestedMenu Component (exported)
 *
 * The top-level component that you use in your app.
 * Pass it your menu “data”, a router match function, and (optionally)
 * expansion mode and class name overrides.
 * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 */
const NestedMenu: FC<NestedMenuProps> = ({
  data,
  matchFn,
  allowMultipleExpanded = true,
  classNames = {},
}) => {
  return (
    <nav className={cn('nested-menu', classNames.container)}>
      <MenuList
        items={data}
        matchFn={matchFn}
        allowMultipleExpanded={allowMultipleExpanded}
        classNames={classNames}
      />
    </nav>
  );
};

export default function NestedMenuDemo() {
  const routerMatchFn = (href: string) => window.location.pathname === href;

  const menuData: MenuItemData[] = [
    {
      id: '1',
      label: 'Home',
      href: '/',
    },
    {
      id: '2',
      label: 'About',
      href: '/about',
    },
    {
      id: '3',
      label: 'Services',
      children: [
        {
          id: '3-1',
          label: 'Web Development',
          href: '/services/web',
        },
        {
          id: '3-2',
          label: 'Mobile Development',
          children: [
            {
              id: '3-2-1',
              label: 'iOS',
              href: '/services/mobile/ios',
            },
            {
              id: '3-2-2',
              label: 'Android',
              href: '/services/mobile/android',
            },
          ],
        },
      ],
    },
  ];

  return (
    <div className="w-[200px]">
      <NestedMenu
        data={menuData}
        matchFn={routerMatchFn}
        allowMultipleExpanded={false} // set to false for single-expanded per level
        classNames={{
          container: 'my-menu-container',
          list: 'my-menu-list',
          item: 'my-menu-item',
          trigger: 'my-menu-trigger',
          content: 'my-menu-content',
        }}
      />
    </div>
  );
}

import {
	Bug,
	FileText,
	Globe,
	LogOut,
	Mail,
	Monitor,
	Package,
	Plus,
	Server,
	Settings,
	Shield,
	Trash,
	User,
	UserPlus,
	Users,
} from 'lucide-react';

import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
import { NestedMenu, NestedMenuButton, NestedMenuGroup, NestedMenuItem, NestedMenuLabel, NestedMenuSeparator, NestedMenuSub } from '@/components/ui/nested-menu';

export default function NestedMenuDemo() {
	return (
    <NestedMenu className="w-64">
      <NestedMenuLabel>
        My Account
      </NestedMenuLabel>
      <NestedMenuSeparator/>
      <NestedMenuGroup>
        <NestedMenuItem value="profile">
          <NestedMenuButton>
            <User />
            <span className="ml-2">Profile</span>
          </NestedMenuButton>
        </NestedMenuItem>
        <NestedMenuItem value="inbox">
          <NestedMenuButton>
            <Mail />
            <span className="ml-2">Inbox</span>
          </NestedMenuButton>
        </NestedMenuItem>
        <NestedMenuItem value="settings">
          <NestedMenuButton>
            <Settings />
            <span className="ml-2">Settings</span>
          </NestedMenuButton>
        </NestedMenuItem>
      </NestedMenuGroup>

      <NestedMenuLabel>
        Team Management
      </NestedMenuLabel>
      <NestedMenuSeparator/>
      <NestedMenuGroup>
        <NestedMenuItem value="team-settings" toggle>
          <NestedMenuButton>
            <Users />
            <span className="ml-2">Team Settings</span>
          </NestedMenuButton>
          <NestedMenuSub>
            <NestedMenuItem value="permissions" toggle>
              <NestedMenuButton>
                <Shield />
                <span className="ml-2">Permissions</span>
              </NestedMenuButton>
            </NestedMenuItem>
            <NestedMenuItem value="invite-members">
              <NestedMenuButton>
                <UserPlus />
                <span className="ml-2">Invite Members</span>
              </NestedMenuButton>
            </NestedMenuItem>
            <NestedMenuSeparator/>
            <NestedMenuItem value="monitor-activity" toggle>
              <NestedMenuButton>
                <Monitor />
                <span className="ml-2">Monitor Activity</span>
              </NestedMenuButton>
              <NestedMenuSub>
                <NestedMenuItem value="logs">
                  <NestedMenuButton>
                    <FileText />
                    <span className="ml-2">Logs</span>
                  </NestedMenuButton>
                </NestedMenuItem>
                <NestedMenuItem value="server-status">
                  <NestedMenuButton>
                    <Server />
                    <span className="ml-2">Server Status</span>
                  </NestedMenuButton>
                </NestedMenuItem>
                <NestedMenuItem value="web-traffic">
                  <NestedMenuButton>
                    <Globe />
                    <span className="ml-2">Web Traffic</span>
                  </NestedMenuButton>
                </NestedMenuItem>
                <NestedMenuSeparator/>
                <NestedMenuItem value="system-errors">
                  <NestedMenuButton>
                    <Bug />
                    <span className="ml-2 text-destructive">System Errors</span>
                  </NestedMenuButton>
                </NestedMenuItem>
              </NestedMenuSub>
            </NestedMenuItem>
          </NestedMenuSub>
        </NestedMenuItem>
        <NestedMenuItem value="roles" toggle>
          <NestedMenuButton>
            <Shield />
            <span className="ml-2">Roles</span>
          </NestedMenuButton>
          <NestedMenuSub>
            <NestedMenuItem value="add-role">
              <NestedMenuButton>
                <Plus />
                <span className="ml-2">Add Role</span>
              </NestedMenuButton>
            </NestedMenuItem>
            <NestedMenuItem value="assign-roles">
              <NestedMenuButton>
                <Users />
                <span className="ml-2">Assign Roles</span>
              </NestedMenuButton>
            </NestedMenuItem>
            <NestedMenuSeparator/>
            <NestedMenuItem value="delete-role">
              <NestedMenuButton>
                <Trash />
                <span className="ml-2 text-destructive">Delete Role</span>
              </NestedMenuButton>
            </NestedMenuItem>
          </NestedMenuSub>
        </NestedMenuItem>
        <NestedMenuItem value="integrations">
          <NestedMenuButton>
            <Package />
            <span className="ml-2 flex-grow flex items-center justify-between">
              <span>Integrations</span>
              <Badge variant="destructive" shape="circle" size="xs">
                5
              </Badge>
            </span>
          </NestedMenuButton>
        </NestedMenuItem>
      </NestedMenuGroup>

      <NestedMenuSeparator/>
      <NestedMenuItem value="logout">
        <NestedMenuButton>
          <LogOut />
          <span className="ml-2">Log Out</span>
        </NestedMenuButton>
      </NestedMenuItem>
    </NestedMenu>
	);
}
